pr_title: fix(datastore) Add missing converters for AWSTimestamp used by SQLiteStorageAdapter

timeline.message: fix(datastore) Add missing converters for AWSTimestamp used by SQLiteStorageAdapter
fix(datastore) Add missing converters for AWSTimestamp used by SQLiteStorageAdapter

timeline.bodyText: Just to double check, Integer is correct vs. Long or Float?
timeline.author: TrekSoft

replies.bodyText: Yep, this is correct.  SQLite doesn't have different types for an int vs a long, there is only INTEGER. It can hold up to 64 bits, which is the same as a Java long, so it works for either.
replies.author: richardmcclellan
